author: Drishti IAS
title: Pandit Madan Mohan Malaviya Birth Anniversary
text: [Uttar Pradesh](https://www.drishtiias.com/tags/uttar-pradesh) Pandit Madan Mohan Malaviya Birth Anniversary - 29 Dec 2023 - 1 min read Why in News? On the 162nd birth anniversary of [Pandit Madan Mohan Malaviya](/daily-news-analysis/pt-madan-mohan-malaviya) on 25th December 2023, the Prime Minister is scheduled to release the first series of the 'Collected Works of Pandit Madan Mohan Malaviya.' Key Points - The bilingual (English and Hindi) work features writings, speeches, unpublished letters, and other works of Madan Mohan Malaviya. - Madan Mohan Malaviya (25th December 1861 - 2nd November 1946) was an Indian scholar, politician, and educational reformer. - He was a leader in the Indian independence movement and served as president of the [Indian National Congress](/pdf/1592223201-important-indian-national-congress-sessions.pdf)four times. He was also the founder of the Akhil Bharat Hindu Mahasabha and the [Banaras Hindu University.](/state-pcs-current-affairs/bhu-became-the-second-best-university-in-the-country) - He was a leader in the Indian independence movement and served as president of the
